forum.name: T4D2 Discussion: Share Your Formative Assessment Experiences
forum.intro:
Your Responses to the Assessing Learning in the Adult ESL Classroom Video

Based on the video segment you viewed, and your own experiences with similar diagnostic assessment please post your responses to the following questions:

  • Which video segment did you view? Why did you choose this segment?
  • What questions do you have about the assessment activities in the video section you chose?
  • Can you provide more examples of how you use this form of assessment with your learners? (Or how you would like to use this form of assessment with your learners?)

After you post, please take time to review others’ posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
